pullRequest.title: release-0.31.1 to fix one file assumption
pullRequest.bodyText:
Release Checklist

 Updated CHANGELOG with latest changes
 Updated __VERSION__ in semgrep/semgrep/__init__.py
 Updated install_requires version in setup.py for pre-commit in the repo root
 Updated latest release and release date in CHANGELOG.md
 Tests/CI passes on this Pull Request
 Build Release Candidate finished successfully
 Update semgrep action
 Publish Github Release Page
 Sanity check Pypi Packages
 Sanity check Homebrew core release
 Sanity check docker images (X.X.X and latest tag)

commit.message: release-0.31.1 to fix one file assumption

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            - Assumption that only a single configuration was being returned by resolve_config.
          
          
            
            - Regression in 0.31.0 where only a single file was being used when `--config`
          
          
            
              was given a directory with many rules (#2019).```
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -4,6 +4,12 @@ This project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](http://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html
 
 ## Next
 
+## [0.31.1](https://github.com/returntocorp/semgrep/releases/tag/v0.31.1) - 2020-11-11
+
+### Fixed
+
+- Assumption that only a single configuration was being returned by resolve_config.
